      Asks user for Company information if user selected Business in getPassengerDetails Applies Company Discount

      Gets the Passengers Details and passes to appropriate method based on selection
      void getPromo(String flightNumber, int bookingChoice, String seatNo, String passengerName)
      Asks user if their booking is apart of a promotion if they selected ordinary in getPassengerDetails Applies Promotion Discount
      void getResidence(String flightNumber, int bookingChoice, String seatNo, String passengerName)
      Asks user for Island information if user selected Island in getPassengerDetails Applies Residence Discount
      void getSeatno(String flightNo, int choice)
      Panel which asks for user to input a seat number on selected flight Checks whether seat is valid and if it is Free | Booked | Reserved Will soon be deprecated and replaced by graphical screen showing seat layout
      void mainMenu()
      Displays Main Menu
      void selectFlight(String status)
      Method for selecting a flight Clicking on specified flight will direct user to appropriate screen depending on which status is passed
      void webGet()
      Basic Web Get to enable interactive seating plan.

        public void bookPassenger(String flightNumber,
                          int bookingChoice,
                          String seatNo)

        seatNo -
        flightNumber - - Takes Flight number from selectFlight Panel
